newsitem.title: BELGIUM: EU agrees extra gas, electricity networks.
newsitem.headline: EU agrees extra gas, electricity networks.

text.p: European Union energy ministers reached a political agreement on Tuesday on an updated list of trans-European energy networks which may receive financial support, adding 31 new gas and electricity projects.
Emmet Stagg, Minister of State at the Irish Department of Transport, Energy and Communications, said the new projects had reached an advanced stage of development.
"Inclusion on the list means that the projects are eligible for consideration for financial support from the European Commission," he told a news conference.
The projects affect most member states as well as some non-EU countries such as Norway, Poland and Russia.
